  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2409</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2409</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Multicolour Webquest</string>
            <string language="en">Multicolour Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mehrfarbenwebquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest Multicolore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest Multicolour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquest Multicolour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολύχρωμο Webquest</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Webquest en què els alumnes treballen el tema de la multiculturalitat. També han de cercar informació en anglès en diferents pàgines per tal de saber més sobre altres cultures.</string>
            <string language="en">Webquest in which pupils work on the idea of cultural diversity. They must also look for information in English on other websites to learn more about other cultures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació intercultural</string>
            <string language="en">intercultural education</string>
            <string language="es">educación intercultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest, in dem Pupillen auf der Idee der 
kulturellen Verschiedenartigkeit arbeiten. Sie müssen nach 
Informationen auf englisch auf anderen Web site auch suchen, um mehr 
über andere Kulturen zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest dans lequel les pupilles travaillent sur
l'idée de la diversité culturelle. Elles doivent également 
rechercher l'information en anglais sur d'autres sites Web pour 
apprendre plus au sujet d'autres cultures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest em que as pupilas trabalham na idéia da
diversidade cultural. Devem também procurar a informação em 
inglês em outros Web site para aprender mais sobre outras culturas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquest in cui le pupille lavorano all'idea 
della diversità culturale. Devono anche cercare le informazioni
in inglese su altri Web site per imparare più circa altre colture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquest στο οποίο οι μαθητές εργάζονται στην ιδέα
της πολιτιστικής ποικιλομορφίας. Πρέπει επίσης να ψάξουν 
τις πληροφορίες στα αγγλικά για άλλους ιστοχώρους για να μάθουν 
περισσότερους για άλλους πολιτισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interkulturelle Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation interculturelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução intercultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione intercultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαπολιτισμική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
